title: SRL: Scaling Distributed Reinforcement Learning to Over Ten Thousand Cores. (arXiv:2306.16688v1 [cs.DC])
abstract: The ever-growing complexity of reinforcement learning (RL) tasks demands a distributed RL system to efficiently generate and process a massive amount of data to train intelligent agents. However, existing open-source libraries suffer from various limitations, which impede their practical use in challenging scenarios where large-scale training is necessary. While industrial systems from OpenAI and DeepMind have achieved successful large-scale RL training, their system architecture and implementation details remain undisclosed to the community. In this paper, we present a novel abstraction on the dataflows of RL training, which unifies practical RL training across diverse applications into a general framework and enables fine-grained optimizations. translated_title: SRL: 将分布式强化学习扩展到一万多个核心
translated_abstract: 强化学习（RL）任务的不断复杂化要求分布式RL系统可以高效地生成和处理大量数据以训练智能Agent。然而，现有的开源库存在各种限制，阻碍了它们在需要大规模训练的挑战性场景中的实际应用。虽然OpenAI和DeepMind的工业系统已经成功实现了大规模RL训练，但是它们的系统架构和实现细节对社区来说仍然不公开。在本文中，我们提出了RL训练数据流的新抽象，将各种应用中的实际RL训练统一成一个通用框架，并实现了精细优化。根据这个抽象，我们开发了一个可扩展、高效、可扩展的分布式RL系统，名为"ReaLly Scalable RL（SRL）"。
tldr: SRL是一个可扩展，高效，可扩展的分布式强化学习系统，通过一种新的抽象框架统一了各种实际强化学习训练，并实现了精细优化。
en_tdlr: SRL is a scalable, efficient, and extensible distributed reinforcement learning system that unifies diverse practical RL training into a new abstract framework and enables fine-grained optimizations.
